rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: A spacious area with large windows and sliding glass doors for natural light, designed to double as a living room and dining space. Features modern industrial aesthetics with exposed brick walls and metal finishes.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, ample storage, and a ventilation system ensuring natural airflow. The design incorporates sustainable materials in line with local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy master bedroom offering privacy and comfort, positioned to receive ample morning sunlight following Vastu principles. Incorporates built-in wardrobes and soundproofing.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: An ensuite bathroom designed for efficiency with proper ventilation and water-saving fixtures. Placement follows Vastu guidelines to ensure privacy and balance.

rooms.name: Utility/Storage Room
rooms.description: A dedicated utility room for appliances, storage, and laundry, ensuring a clutter-free environment. Its location adheres to Vastu principles by avoiding disruption of energy flow.

openings.description: Large windows with adjustable blinds to maximize natural light and facilitate cross ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Sturdy door ensuring security while allowing smooth flow of energy and natural light into the space.
Optimally placed windows to capture morning sunlight, promoting a positive start to the day as recommended by Vastu principles.
Ventilated windows for effective cross ventilation and natural light in the kitchen area.
Privacy door with soundproofing features, aligning with Vastu principles for quiet and serenity.

swimming_pool.description: An outdoor swimming pool designed with a modern industrial aesthetic. Includes safety features and is positioned to enhance natural ventilation and sunlight exposure for surrounding areas.

vastu_considerations.materials: Use of locally sourced materials and finishes that align with sustainable practices.
